description: Bridges: Method `findMerchantUser()` must have `public function get<DomainEntity>Collection(<DomainEntity>CriteriaTransfer): <DomainEntity>CollectionTransfer` signature.

Bridges: The bridge interface has incorrect method signature for `authorizeMerchantUser()`. Method does not exist in parent. That violates the rule "All bridge interface methods must have exactly the same or more strict signature as their parent"
Bridges: Method `addErrorMessage()` must have `public function create<DomainEntity>Collection(<DomainEntity>CollectionRequestTransfer): <DomainEntity>CollectionResponseTransfer` signature.
